data.prayer: Father, move the 63,036 believers in the state of Manica to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Manica, Mozambique
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Manica, Mozambique.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Manica, Mozambique to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of Manica to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Manica.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Manica who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Manica, Mozambique has a population of 478,800.

We estimate Manica has 63,036 people who might know Jesus, 187,865 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 227,898 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 7 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Manica.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

location.name: Manica
location.people_groups_list: Ndau, Shona, Senji, Barwe, Tewe, Nyungwe
